scripts.lib: npm run lib:pre-process && npm run lib:babel-build && npm run lib:types && npm run lib:post-cleanup
scripts.lib:clean-build: npm run lib:clean && npm run lib
scripts.lib:post-cleanup: npm run lib:post-clean-styleGuides && npm run lib:post-clean-img && npm run lib:post-clean-tests && node ./scripts/lib/lib-fix-worker-babel.js
scripts.checks: npm run lib && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.checks:docker: npm run build:docker-image && npm run lib:docker && npm run test:docker && npm run build:docker
scripts.start:docker: docker run --platform=$(docker system info --format '{{.OSType}}/{{.Architecture}}') --rm --tty --interactive --volume=/$(pwd):/app/src --volume=/app/src/node_modules --workdir=/app/src --publish=3010:3010 portal-core-components:latest-builder npm run start
scripts.start:docker-prod: docker run --platform=$(docker system info --format '{{.OSType}}/{{.Architecture}}') --rm --tty --interactive --volume=/$(pwd):/app/src --volume=/app/src/node_modules --workdir=/app/src --publish=3000:3000 portal-core-components:latest-builder npm run start:prod
scripts.build:docker-build-image: docker buildx build --platform=$(docker system info --format '{{.OSType}}/{{.Architecture}}') --no-cache --tag portal-core-components:latest-builder --file ./build.Dockerfile .
scripts.build:docker-image: (npm run build:docker-clean || true) && npm run build:docker-build-image
scripts.build:docker: docker run --platform=$(docker system info --format '{{.OSType}}/{{.Architecture}}') --rm --tty --interactive --env GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false --env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 --volume=/$(pwd):/app/src --volume=/app/src/node_modules --workdir=/app/src portal-core-components:latest-builder npm run build
scripts.lib:docker: docker run --platform=$(docker system info --format '{{.OSType}}/{{.Architecture}}') --rm --tty --interactive --volume=/$(pwd):/app/src --volume=/app/src/node_modules --workdir=/app/src portal-core-components:latest-builder npm run lib
scripts.test:docker: docker run --platform=$(docker system info --format '{{.OSType}}/{{.Architecture}}') --rm --tty --interactive --volume=/$(pwd):/app/src --volume=/app/src/node_modules --workdir=/app/src portal-core-components:latest-builder npm run test:docker-command
scripts.test:docker-update-snapshots: docker run --platform=$(docker system info --format '{{.OSType}}/{{.Architecture}}') --rm --tty --interactive --volume=/$(pwd):/app/src --volume=/app/src/node_modules --workdir=/app/src portal-core-components:latest-builder npm run test:docker-command-update-snapshots
scripts.test:docker-command: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test:docker-command-update-snapshots: npm run lint && npm run test:updateSnapshots
